{"id":1217256606,"question_id":29,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1711712021,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1217256606/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"41.3 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n\t\t//all of these if else statements are only for edge cases and to make both dividend and divisor negative\n        if (dividend == Integer.MIN_VALUE && divisor == -1)\n            return Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        if (divisor == 1)\n            return dividend;\n        if (dividend > 0 && divisor > 0)\n            return divide(-dividend, -divisor);\n        else if (dividend > 0)\n            return -divide(-dividend, divisor);\n        else if (divisor > 0)\n            return -divide(dividend, -divisor);\n        if (divisor < dividend || dividend == 0)\n            return 0;\n        int sum = divisor;\n        int mult = 1;\n        while ((sum + sum) < sum && (sum + sum) >= dividend) {\n            sum += sum;\n            mult += mult;\n        }\n        return mult + divide(dividend - sum, divisor);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
